item.title: Theme Features
item.description: Here are some helpful tips for setting up this theme. Configuration Most of what you’ll want to configure is demonstrated in the exampleSite config.toml. This is Hugo’s configuration file. You can copy the config.toml in the exampleSite/ to your site root get started. Here are all the options included in the configuration file for this example site! Syntax Highlighting Introduction allows the use of Hugo’s rich built-in syntax highlighting capabilities.
